input.sentences: i went to the car show the other day .
there were mostly new sports cars on display .
it reminded me of a movie set .
i saw my first lamborghini in person .
the cars were roped off so nobody could get very close to them .
output.sentences: I love this white racing car.
No, I actually love this green one.
Yeah, but who can't love black.
I want the black one with the spoiler.
Just relax, there's plenty to choose from.
